letters_numbers: Letter Q activities: tracing with wet-dry-try method, building letter Q with wooden pieces, discussing Q sounds and words
sensory: Apple Wash: plastic apples, sponges, soap, and water
raw_excerpt: Classroom plan for Pre-K week of 10/13-10/17 with theme 'In the Orchard'. Includes books, letter Q activities, crafts, science, math, sensory table, and motor skill tasks.
